  1. Work

Agile Government Leadership

Government digital transformation community.

In 2014, I started Agile Government Leadership as an open community of practice to bring together government and industry leaders to support, learn and collaborate around issues such as agile project management, open source and human-centered design. In 2018, AGL formed as an official nonprofit organization and re-branded as Technologists for the Public Good in 2021.
